verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Faithful is He
Who has started His good work in me.
Every promise He will keep.
Every work He will complete.
Faithful is He.
Faithful is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Time after time, we falter,
And time after time, God is there,
Sharing His grace sufficient that we
Over sin might prevail.
And I wonder that He loves us
And still delights in treasures encased
In vessels of clay,
Demonstrating God's unfailing faithfulness.
